actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
House Committee on House Administration Discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Called up by House by Unanimous Consent.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution providing for one additional position on the Capitol Police for duty under the House of Representatives.

summary.text: Establishes one additional position of agency training representative on the Capitol Police for duty under the House of Representatives. Requires such appointment to be made from among members and officers of the Capitol Police, with prior approval of the Committee on House Administration, and without regard to political affiliation. States that the former position of any officer or member serving as agency training representative shall not be filled while that person is so serving, and that upon ceasing to serve in such capacity, such officer or member shall revert to his or her former position.

titles.title: A resolution providing for one additional position on the Capitol Police for duty under the House of Representatives.
